title: France panorama. [No. 72/44]
creator_credit: Pathé Frères and Societe d'informations Cinematographiques
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Autumn Grand Prix - Arch of Triumph prize at Longchamp; The Bonsais - miniature decorative trees. 2. Commercial aviation - Roissy en France, the Mercure, Concord, European Airbus, and the latest Caravelle. 3. The fruit market - Cavaillon, source of the fruit supply for the Paris region. 4. Cezanne and water-colors - water-colors by Cezanne.
